RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 87. Claiming Purse 20800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BRIG sprinted to a daylight lead soon after the start, set all the pace unchallenged and won as much the best. FIRSTHAND JUSTICE chased the winner from the inside for a half, drifted to the five path and finished clear for second. TIZ A RUSH slow early, closed a gap late inside rivals. GOLDEN MONEY unhurried early, swung wide passed tiring rivals through the stretch in the middle of the racetrack. EL MARRO chased the winner two wide into the stretch, was carried out to the six path and faded late. OL' L B had brief speed. CRAZYCANTBERIGHTED allowed to settle, improved on the turn then came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Brig
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace, unchallenged, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: El Marro
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, carried out 6path, faded lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 18300. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 20 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRECIOUS JULES was in tight at the start, trailed far back, closed with a rush along the inside under right handed urging to make the lead late and drew off. TRAITOR AMONGST US gained a narrow advantage before a quarter, dueled into the turn, set a pressured pace into the stretch, drifted to the six path, edged clear inside the furlong marker then couldn't handle the winner. JUST CHESTER pressed the pace two wide into the stretch and was outfinished. CHISELED JUSTICE vied for the lead four wide and went evenly. MA MOO POWER dueled for the early lead three wide and was through after half.

ENTRY.NAME: Traitor Amongst Us
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, drifted 6path, edged clear, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Precious Jules
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight start, far back, closed with a rush inside, drew off,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 12600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 20 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ICON never far back, rallied through wide through the turn, made the lead in upper stretch, drifted in a bit at the furlong marker and drew off under a hand ride. NICHOLAS JAMES pressed the pace two wide into the turn, made the lead, set the pace into the stretch, steadied inside the winner at the furlong marker, shifted to the five path then was no match while clear for second. TEMPLEMAN ALLEY well placed in the four path, went evenly. STRIKE A BEAT failed to menace. BRYCE'S ANGEL had good early speed along the inside, remained within striking distance into the stretch then faltered. HEY SACH away alertly, set a pressured pace along the rail until mid turn then was used up. THE RIDER OF NICHOLAS JAMES LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF ICON FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE IN THE STRETCH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Sach
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace mid turn, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Icon
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, rallied 3 wide turn, drifted in a bit1/8pole, hand ride

ENTRY.NAME: Nicholas James
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed, took over 5/16p, steadied, shifted 5p, 1/8p,claimed foul

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 50. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 20 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WILDCAT EXPRESS was fractious in the gate prior to the start, bobbled outward bumping OXBOW'S RIDE at the start, set the early pace under pressured, shook clear before the turn then widened the balance of the balance of the trip to win as much the best while taken in hand late. OXBOW'S RIDE was bumped at the start, allowed to settle, rallied through the stretch in the six and four paths and finished second best. STRIKE ONE pressured the winner from the inside early, chased the pace the balance of the trip and was outfinished. HAPPY TAKEOVER was no factor. AFLEET O ME was outrun. BILLY BEACOUP was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Strike One
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside early, chased, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcat Express
ENTRY.OWNER: Vigil Alan Boots N Bikinis LLC and Blue Snow Racing Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, bobbled outward, bumped start, widened, much best

ENTRY.NAME: Oxbow's Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, settled, rallied 6-4paths, clear second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 20. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TUFF ATTACK prompted the pace two wide into the stretch, responded under left handed urging to gain a narrow lead in the final stages and proved best while fully extended. JOHNNY U away alertly, set a pressured pace inside the winner until deep stretch, dug in gamely but just missed hanging on. REINSURE with the second flight two wide, angled to the five path entering the stretch then went evenly. KING RICHIE with the second flight inside, failed to respond. MR. TRIPLEDOUBLE had good early speed then faded. BULLION trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: King Richie
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, inside, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Johnny U
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, dug in gamely, just failed,

ENTRY.NAME: Tuff Attack
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2 wide, proved best, left handed urging,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 11800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since March 20 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5, 000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RIPLEY EFFECT trailed around the clubhouse turn, moved up steadily circling her field, rallied through deep stretch under left handed urging and got up in the final strides. UNESCORTED chased the pace along the inside through the far turn, shifted out to the five path entering the stretch, angled back in two wide near the furlong marker, came back on and got up for second. UNDERCOVER LADY broke in front, set the pace into the stretch, opened a clear lead before the furlong marker and was outfinished in the final stages. PLAYFUL SUMMER chased the pace two wide then along the inside through the stretch and went evenly. MAY BEAU failed to menace. CONDUTTORE close up early, was through after a half. INDY LITES had brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: Unescorted
ENTRY.OWNER: Mace Ed and Urieta's Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, dropped back, came again, 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Undercover Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, drew off upper stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Ripley Effect
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, circled field, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Conduttore
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 27500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 20 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Pref erred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AUJARA rushed to contention along the rail, got through to make the lead on the turn then widened the balance of the trip under a strong hand ride to win as much the best while going away. DIVA POWER away alertly, set the pace off the rail into the turn then was no match for the winner while well clear for second. BOX STEP raced outside and went evenly. CHLOES ANGEL unhurried early, offered a mild bid along the rail into the stretch then leveled off. RAINBOW SHIP chased the pace three then two wide and weakened in the stretch. BOOGIE BOOGEE had brief speed. JETTIN PEGASUS was no factor. DANCIN' ROSIE was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Diva Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace off rail, no match for winner, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Aujara
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed inside, got through turn, full of run, going away

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 20 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TWICE AS SMART sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, set all the pace and maintained his advantage under mild urging. SMUDGE THE CAT broke alertly, chase the winner, drew closer nearing the top of the stretch then was no match while well clear for second. THE WILD FLYER went evenly. GET ALONG was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Twice as Smart
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, held well, mild urging

ENTRY.NAME: Smudge the Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, drew closer upper stretch, no match for winner,
